name: Egg Car - Don't Drop the Egg!
name_original: Egg Car - Don't Drop the Egg!
description:
Grabs the #1 spot in the Games Category in 6 countries: Finland, Netherlands, Norway, Slovenia, Austria, and Iceland!
Reached the #1 rank in the Arcade Category in 9 countries!

Humpty Dumpty never sat on walls; Humpty Dumpty rode awesome wheels!
Embark on an EGG-ceptional journey with one important mission at hand: DON'T. DROP. THE. EGG.
Tap the right arrow button to move forward, then hit the left arrow button to reverse.
Unlock the coolest cars as you reach certain distances, and collect coins to get the rest!

Be patient though, it's not as easy as you think.
